Facilitating government-led efforts to change citizens' behaviour against littering.
 






 
Involves citizens, vendors, retailers, and logistics groups



 
Precise waste data traceability with AI-led processes



 
3. Complete operational control via a single dashboard

Our customers say.. 



 






						“Recykal has built a user-friendly, easy-to-navigate tool. By using it, we are able to track the complete journey of our plastic waste from source to cement processing units where it is upcycled and used for energy generation. This kind of transparency and traceability are important for a responsible organisation like Mars”
					


- Vasudha Jha, Corporate Affairs Director, Mars Petcare India.

						“Recykal has built a user-friendly, easy-to-navigate tool.
